title: Red Bull Graduate Program
description:
Red Bull Graduate Program

If you think life’s too short for a boring career, the Red Bull Global Graduate Program is made for you.

The program:

Based in one of our European subsidiaries or our HQ in Fuschl am See (Austria), the program begins in September 2011. If accepted, you’ll get to know what makes Red Bull the dynamic energy drinks sector’s global leader and complete a major project in either Marketing, Sales, Finance, IT, HR or Operations.

Candidate requirements:

•Excellent academic track record and/or proven extra-curricular achievements
•Up to 3 years of relevant work experience (e.g. internships)
•Fluency in English and additional languages depending on your project
•Motivated by the results you achieve

What we offer:

•18 month program with the option of completing a Master of Business and Engineering degree)
•A real job where youn can make an impact from day 1
•An international environment
•State-of-the-art training at leading institutes and international universities

For more information and to apply go to www.redbull.at/jobs before March 27, 2011.
